name: Riddles of the Dungeon
description:
this is my little entry to the minijam
is bassed on porklike tutorial, but with my own changes and functions
it was really fun to make this, especially being my first time, and definitely after some rest i'll be updating this game following the same thematic

genres i tried to mix are dungeon crawling and puzzle solving (on the way to finish the levels and get health)

make sure to read every tablet for clues!
